error.description: The error message if the request was unsuccessful

error_code.description: The error code if the request was unsuccessful

additionalProperties.description: A map of object IDs to the roles the subject has for each object ID

items.description: A map of object IDs to the roles the subject has for each object ID

object_roles.description: A map of object IDs to the roles the subject has for each object ID

roles.description: @deprecated use ObjectRoles instead. A list of roles the subject has for the specified object

items.description: @deprecated use ObjectRoles instead. A list of roles the subject has for the specified object

success.description: Whether or not the request was successful or not
